thread.title: BRIEF-Ally Financial Sees Adjusted EPS Growth Of 20 Pct To 30 Pct For 2018

title: BRIEF-Ally Financial Sees Adjusted EPS Growth Of 20 Pct To 30 Pct For 2018
text: March 15, 2018 / 11:55 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Ally Financial Sees Adjusted EPS Growth Of 20 Pct To 30 Pct For 2018 Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - Ally Financial Inc: * SEES ADJUSTED EPS GROWTH OF 20 PERCENT TO 30 PERCENT FOR 2018 - PRESENTATION SLIDES * 2018 CORE ROTCE TARGET OF 10.5 PERCENT - 11.5 PCT‍​ * SEES NET FINANCING REVENUE (EXCLUDING CORE OID) UP 6 PERCENT TO 8 PERCENT Y-O-Y FOR Q1 2018 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.06 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text: ( bit.ly/2pcl4aa ) Further company coverage:
